title: The Juice Shack
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Indian, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. In the Cliff strip serving juices and shakes. Has coconut milk for shakes and coffee as well porridge with coconut milk plus some salads.
streetAddress: North Cliff , Near Tibetan market, Varkala
